subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When Jimmie Johnson won the Southern 500 on May 12, he ended a 16-race winless streak for Hendrick Motorsports and started a glorious stretch for the team.
snippet: When Jimmie Johnson won the Southern 500 on May 12, he ended a 16-race winless streak for Hendrick Motorsports and started a glorious stretch for the team.
